name: Turkey Wrap by Avocados From Mexico
author: Avocados from Mexico
summary: Cream cheese, bell pepper strips, turkey, lettuce and chunks of avocado are rolled into tortillas spread with cream cheese then sliced into delicious bite-size pieces.
ingredients: 4  (8 to 10 inch) flour tortillas, any flavor
½ pound thinly sliced cooked turkey (from deli)
directions: Spread each tortilla evenly with cream cheese
Arrange lettuce evenly over cream cheese to within 1 inch of top edge
Top with single layer of bell pepper strips
Evenly layer turkey slices over bell pepper
Starting with bottom edge, tightly roll up each tortilla
To serve, trim off uneven ends of rolls
Cut rolls into 1-inch slices; arrange on serving platter
